author: RTÉ News
title: UK lockdown to stay as virus peak not reached - Hancock
description: Britain has not yet reached the Covid-19 peak which would allow for an easing of tight restrictions of movement, health minister Matt Hancock has said.
content:
Britain has not yet reached the Covid-19 peak which would allow for an easing of tight restrictions of movement, health minister Matt Hancock has said.
